sentences.en: At the estuary of tidal river, sedimentation occurs when sediments river by tidal flow.
sentences.cn: 感潮河流的入海口河段,因受海潮的影响, 存在着海口淤沙被潮水带回河内淤积的情况.

sentences.en: Due to the sudden narrowness of the estuary, the flood flowed higher and higher.
sentences.cn: 因河口急骤缩小, 洪水流势愈来愈大.

sentences.en: Estuary dynamics, regulation of navigation channels in estuary, and silt problems of harbours and navigation channels.
sentences.cn: 长期从事河口动力学 、 河航道治理及港口航道泥沙的咨询研究,曾为长江口、黄浦江、瓯江等河口整治工程提供咨询.

sentences.en: Hanjiang estuary and its impacts on sediment transportation.
sentences.cn: 河口外则易受西南沿岸流影响,具有近岸输沙的特性.

sentences.en: Nanshan District, San Mianhuan sea, adjacent to the Pearl River Estuary.
sentences.cn: 南山区三面环海, 毗邻珠江口.

sentences.en: The 2 - D tidal current and sediment mathematical model for estuary is established.
sentences.cn: 建立了飞云江口二 维 潮流泥沙数学模型.

sentences.en: The 2 - D tidal current and sediment mathematical model for Feiyunjiang estuary is established.
sentences.cn: 摘要建立了飞云江口二 维 潮流泥沙数学模型.

sentences.en: The canal was built to connect Sheffield with the Humber estuary.
sentences.cn: 修建这条运河是为了将设菲尔德和亨伯河河口连接起来.

sentences.en: The effect of Coriolis effect is obvious by making the estuary deflect to south constantly.
sentences.cn: 河口的不断南偏,可以明显地看到科氏力的影响.

sentences.en: The estuary has a sense of history and heritage.
sentences.cn: 试译:这个港湾有种历史传统感.

sentences.en: The ship has touched bottom, the estuary must be shallower than we thought.
sentences.cn: 船搁浅了, 这河口的水比我们想像的要浅.

sentences.en: The stream debouches into the estuary.
There are many boats in the estuary.
We live near the Thames estuary.
sentences.cn: 我们的住处靠近泰晤士河入海口.

sentences.en: We moored in the estuary, waiting for high tide.
sentences.cn: 我们在港湾停泊, 等待涨潮.

trans.tran_cn: （江河入海的）河口，河口湾，港湾
trans.tran_en: the wide part of a river where it goes into the sea
